casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. LINDSEY JONES, JR. (13720)

Dupont, C. J., and O’Connell and Schaller, Js.

Argued October 31 decision released November 21, 1995 Vicki H. Hutchinson, special public defender, for the appellant (defendant). Lisa Herskowitz, deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Walter D. Flanagan, state’s attorney, and Patricia Gilbert, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
